/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along it, their colors muted against the urban backdrop. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of connections that power the city's life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
